settings.title:
Introducing Fièra
Beauty Bundle
settings.sub_title: Fiera products have received over 4000 5-Star reviews so far. Join hundreds of thousands of happy customers today!
settings.content: For every concealer and neck cream sold, we donate up to 4 meals to people in need. So far, we have donated over 350.000 meals thanks to our amazing customers. We are proud to be able to make a difference!

Specifically formulated for mature skin, our Multi-Effect Neck & Decolletage Cream improves the appearance of sagging skin on the jowls and neck, while reducing lines and wrinkles, crepey texture, dark spots and hyperpigmentation. Used twice per day in the morning and night, this rich, luxurious cream gives many women visible results in just a few weeks.

The next step in a more youthful looking neck and chest area is our Luxury Concealer. Our full-coverage formula not only conceals, but also corrects age-related imperfections on the neck and chest including dark lines, age spots and hyperpigmentation, as well as sagging, crepey skin. Specifically formulated for ages 40 and up, Fièra Luxury Concealer never settles or cakes into fine lines or wrinkles. After applying the Multi-Effect Neck & Decolletage Cream in the morning, apply just a small amount of the Concealer onto problem areas on the neck and chest and use the Fièra Concealer Brush to blend it into the skin.
Used consistently, this powerful duo will not only improve the tone and texture of the entire neck and chest area, but also to completely conceal any lasting discoloration and give a youthful glow.

settings.title: How Fièra <br class="forMob">Beauty Bundle Works
settings.sub_title: Conceal any imperfections with our concealer, and perfect your look with our silky ultra-lux setting powder. Scientifically formulated to work together, this duo will ensure your makeup is set and guarantee you that fresh all day look long into the evening.
settings.content_1: Covers up even the most stubborn wrinkles, deep fine lines, puffy under-eye bags and unsightly blemishes
settings.content_2: Active ingredients like caprylic triglyceride and hydrolyzed collagen will soften skin and restore suppleness and moisture.
settings.content_3: Fièra Luxury Concealer restores moisture to promote healing of your skin
settings.content_4: Fièra HD matte ultra luxury finishing powder locks in your makeup for all day wear

settings.title: Sodium Hyaluronate
settings.content: The sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, able to hold more water than any other natural substance—up to 1000 times its weight in water for maximum skin hydration that tightens and improves the skin’s overall appearance.

settings.title: Glycolic Acid
settings.content: Removes dead skin cells and impurities leading to a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while also making skin look brighter and healthier.

settings.title: Plant Stem Cells
settings.content: Scientifically-proven plant-based stem cells that delay the signs of skin aging and enhance the appearance of skin elasticity, giving your skin that firmer, tighter and smoother look and feel.

settings.title: Squalane
settings.content: For skin collagen, moisturizes and protects the skin from oxidative damage, resulting in tighter, more hydrated skin softness.

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.content: Protecting skin cells against oxidative damage from free radicals.

settings.title: Glycerin
settings.content: A “super hydrator” that firms, tightens, and accelerates skin softness.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title:
Products in the Fièra Lift & Lighten Set contain the highest-
quality, proven ingredients. Together, they work as a 
comprehensive solution to correct and conceal the signs of 
aging on the jowls, neck and chest. Active anti-aging 
ingredients preserve vibrant, youthful-looking skin.
settings.popup_content:
Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Squalane, Phenyl Trimethicone Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, Canola Oil, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Sorbitan Stearate, Sodium Hyaluronate, PEG-100 Stearate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Silica, Glycosaminoglycans, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Sodium Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Xanthan Gum, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Cellulose Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Sodium Hydroxide, Cholesterol, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol, Tetrasodium EDTA.

Fièra Luxury Concealer

Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, VP/Hexadecene Copolymer, Cetyl Alcohol, Ozokerite, Phytosteryl Macadamiate, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Retinyl Palmitate, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Tocopherol, Glycerin, Steareth-20, Chrysin, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, [+/- (May Contain): Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Ultramarines (CI 77007)

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
settings.content: We’re so confident you'll love our Fièra products we offer a Hassle-free 30 day Money Back Guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your purchase simply return the items back to us for a full refund.
